name: pq-ts
description: A priority queue written in TypeScript.

scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && tsup main.ts --dts --format esm,cjs --sourcemap
scripts.bench:node: npm install && ts-node bench.ts && npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.docs:generate: npx rimraf docs && deno doc --html --name=pq-ts main.ts
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:generate && npx gh-pages -d docs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run docs:generate
